title: Missing
resume: Becca Winstone learns that her son, Michael, disappears  while studying abroad, and it's a race against time when she travels to  Europe to track him down. A surprising turn of events reveals just how  far one mother will go to protect her family. Exotic locations and  thrilling twists will keep you riveted in "Missing."
